hero.title: ARCADIUM
hero.tagline: Take Your Event to the Next Level
hero.subtitle: Mobile Arcade Game Rentals for Unforgettable Parties & Events

about.title: Why Choose Arcadium?
about.subtitle: We bring the arcade to you with professional service and unforgettable entertainment
about.description1: Founded by gaming enthusiasts, we've transformed over
about.description2: into legendary experiences since our inception.
about.description3: Our passion is bringing people together through the timeless joy of arcade gaming. Whether it's a child's birthday party, corporate team-building event, or a wedding reception with a twist, we deliver entertainment that guests can't stop talking about.
about.description4: Every game in our collection is
about.description5: and tested before each event. We don't just rent games - we create experiences.

premiumSelection.title: Premium Selection
premiumSelection.description: Curated collection of classic and modern arcade games, professionally maintained

instantFun.title: Instant Fun
instantFun.description: All games arrive fully tested and ready to play - plug and play entertainment
